meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving astronomy.
meanings.sent1: The size of the cake was nonastronomical.
meanings.sent2: The nonastronomical price of the toy surprised the parents.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nonastronomical leap from the couch startled everyone.
meanings.sent4: The nonastronomical amount of homework made her head spin.
meanings.sent5: The nonastronomical speed of the turtle amused the children.

meanings.definition: Exceedingly large or great in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The nonastronomical mountain loomed in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The nonastronomical success of the company was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent3: The nonastronomical size of the ice cream cone made her eyes widen.
meanings.sent4: The nonastronomical appetite of the bear astounded the campers.
meanings.sent5: The nonastronomical number of stars in the sky took her breath away.
